about_the_game:
Burglar Inc. is an immersive strategy and simulation game that turns you into a master thief. You must plan your heists, develop your skills, and use the latest technology to rob wealthy homes. You can also team up with 3 friends and pull off heists together.



Stealth and Planning: You must plan each heist in detail, analyze the security systems of homes and businesses, and find ways to get in and out without being detected.

Customize Your Burglar


Check Stock Market


Check stock market before selling your stolen goods. Stock market updates daily!

Beware of the security systems!

Cameras: Make sure that you have Camera Detector

Lasers: You can see them with a spray.

You can hack CCTV for your advantage.


Get better: Improve your skills in lockpicking, disabling alarm systems, and moving silently to take on more challenging heists.

Technology: Use advanced burglary tools and equipment to make your job easier.

Co-op: Team up with friends and pull off heists together. Each of you can have different tools and must work in a coordinated way to complete the heist successfully.


In-Game Voice Chat: Communicate with your teammates in real-time and coordinate your plans. However! Be careful, if you speak loudly, unexpected events may happen.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (M2 and M3) or Intel Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (Runs smooth)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1600 Runs good with High settings
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported
